mapper.select: select date_format(establish_date,'%Y-%m-%d') from ipo_case where id = #{id}
select title relationFileTitle, notice_time publishTime, suffix from ipo_file where id = #{id}
SELECT label_name FROM maa_conf_label WHERE label_code = #{labelCode} AND FIND_IN_SET(label_value,#{ids}) ORDER BY label_sort;

select lm.id AS issueLawId, case when lm.law_invalid is not null and lm.law_invalid != '' and lm.law_invalid <= now() then "已失效" when lm.law_effect_date > now() then "待失效" when lm.modify_date is not null and lm.modify_date != '' then "已被修改" end as tmpRemarks from law_evolution_group leg, laws_manage lm where lm.laws_name like '%上海证券交易所科创板股票发行上市审核规则%' and lm.id= leg.law_id and lm.laws_name not like "%的决定" having tmpRemarks is null order by lm.published desc limit 1;
SELECT id FROM law_xml_structure_detail WHERE law_id = #{lawId} AND title = #{title};
